product.title: Jetsetter Insulated Sleeve
product.description:
Take your smoothie to go! Slip your BlendJet into this protective insulated pouch to keep your drink’s chill factor. Ideal for stashing your portable blender in your gym bag, purse or suitcase, or bringing something to sip on your commute.

JETSETTER INSULATED SLEEVE FEATURES:
  • Designed to hold your BlendJet One or 2
  • Constructed with durable, high quality materials to protect your BlendJet
  • Provides hours-worth of insulation to keep your ingredients cold
  • Water-repellent fabric
  • Zippered top closure
  • Built-in wrist strap makes it easy to carry
  • Easy to clean
MATERIALS & CARE:
  • Body: Durable water-repellent coated nylon
  • Lining: Durable water-repellent coated polyester fabric
  • 1 cm thick closed-cell poly foam insulation
  • Wipe clean with a damp cloth. Do not wash or dry clean.
DETAILS & SPECS:
  • Designed to fit both BlendJet One and BlendJet 2
  • Dimensions: 3.5” x 3.5” x 11 (9cm x 9cm x 28cm)
  • Weight: 2.4 oz (70.9 mL)
  • Volume: 1.6L

bundle.title: Jetsetter Insulated Sleeve
bundle.description:
Take your smoothie to go! Slip your BlendJet into this protective insulated pouch to keep your drink’s chill factor. Ideal for stashing your portable blender in your gym bag, purse or suitcase, or bringing something to sip on your commute.

JETSETTER INSULATED SLEEVE FEATURES:
  • Designed to hold your BlendJet One or 2
  • Constructed with durable, high quality materials to protect your BlendJet
  • Provides hours-worth of insulation to keep your ingredients cold
  • Water-repellent fabric
  • Zippered top closure
  • Built-in wrist strap makes it easy to carry
  • Easy to clean
MATERIALS & CARE:
  • Body: Durable water-repellent coated nylon
  • Lining: Durable water-repellent coated polyester fabric
  • 1 cm thick closed-cell poly foam insulation
  • Wipe clean with a damp cloth. Do not wash or dry clean.
DETAILS & SPECS:
  • Designed to fit both BlendJet One and BlendJet 2
  • Dimensions: 3.5” x 3.5” x 11 (9cm x 9cm x 28cm)
  • Weight: 2.4 oz (70.9 mL)
  • Volume: 1.6L

product.title: Jetsetter Insulated Tote
product.description:
A comfy tote specially made for jetting around town with your personal, portable blender. Perfectly sized to carry your BlendJet, JetPacks and extra snacks, this bag functions like a mini fridge with an insulated, leak-resistant liner that keeps ingredients chilled for hours, so you can make more of your favorite recipes on the go. Fill it with yogurt, fruit and anything else you need to power through your day. Just right for camping, picnicking, work lunches, and making fresh baby food on the fly.

JETSETTER INSULATED TOTE FEATURES:
  • Constructed with durable, high-quality materials to protect your BlendJet
  • Provides hours-worth of insulation to keep your ingredients cold
  • Internal pocket designed to fit your BlendJet One or 2 perfectly
  • Two internal pockets hold up to 8 JetPacks
  • Water-repellent fabric
  • Zippered top closure
  • Easy to clean
MATERIALS & CARE:
  • Body: Durable water-repellent coated nylon
  • Lining: Durable water-repellent coated polyester fabric
  • 1 cm thick closed-cell poly foam insulation
  • Wipe clean with a damp cloth. Do not wash or dry clean.
DETAILS & SPECS:
  • 1 interior pocket designed to fit both BlendJet One and BlendJet 2
  • 2 interior pockets designed to fit up to 8 JetPacks
  • Dimensions: 17.3” x 7.4” x 11.81” (44cm x 19 cm x 30 cm)
  • Weight: 10 oz (295.7 mL)
  • Volume: 18L

upsells.title: PB2 - Powdered Peanut Butter
upsells.subtitle: Peanut Butter w/ Less Calories and Fat

product.title: PB2
product.description:
Fulfilled by our friends at PB2 Foods

The Original Powdered Peanut Butter – Now USDA Certified Organic!

PB2 Organic Powdered Peanut Butter is peanut butter reimagined! Freshly roasted organic peanuts are pressed to remove most of the oil. Mix in a little sugar and a dash of salt for flavor, and the result is peanut butter with only 1.5g of fat per serving - almost 70% fewer calories than traditional peanut butter and 6g of plant-based protein.

The subject of powdered peanut butter tends to create a lot of questions. One we hear frequently is, Why should I make the switch to powdered? Although PB2 and traditional peanut butter are alike in flavor, there a few things that we think make PB2 the better choice for your busy lifestyle. Here’s our reasoning:

Fewer calories and less fat: Compared to its traditional counterparts, PB2 has 90% less fat and 70% fewer calories, all while still retaining the delicious peanut butter taste that we know and love.

It’s protein-packed: Like its traditional counterparts, PB2 packs in the protein per serving. Depending on which variety of PB2 you’re using, you’ll find 4 to 6 grams of protein per 13-gram serving. Also, it’s easy to replace the protein powder in your morning smoothie with PB2, due to the similarity in the powder consistency.

More versatility in the kitchen: Because of its powdered form, it’s easy to incorporate PB2 into all of your favorite peanut butter recipes. To keep things simple, we’ve sorted PB2’s best uses into three categories: bake, blend and mix.

It’s kosher, vegan, and gluten-free: Not only are PB2 products void of any GMOs, they also work well with a wide variety of dietary preferences.

Looking for recipes that feature PB2? Check out our Recipes portfolio.

Interested in purchasing in store? Find PB2 in your local store.

I know most people think the original doesnt taste very good on it's own, but I absolutely love it! Easy breakfast on the run!
KELLY
As a full time grad student who is also working part time and my internship starting this has been great as a morning breakfast replacement, quick, easy, and delicious.
Kevin
Great taste and consistently pleasurable to drink day after day, i do not get sick of it. However a bit pricey to be a budget meal replacement, my only wish is for it to be a little more aggressive compared to buying the bare minimum groceries for a month
John
Great lunch at work replacement. Wish it was sold in much larger bags. My wife and I just had a 12 oz. serving each and there's only 1 - 2 meals left. A larger resealable tub would be nice. Overall taste and feeling of fullness has improved since I last tried Soylent back when it launched. Seems expensive at first until I broke down the cost of lunches I was making for work. These are just as nutritious, faster to prepare, and has less calories than the wraps I was making.
Scott
The powder is easy to mix and it results in a easy to digest, smooth, good tasting shake. I just wish the bag was bigger because I don't enjoy wasting so many plastic pouches.
Zachary
Great, easy convenient, filling but I wish there was less added sugar. I get that it definitely enhances flavor And it's nowhere near what you find in sodas and yogurts but I wouldn't mind more bland if it meant less added sugar
lily
It's disgusting and inedible. Tastes NOTHING like the bottled cacao version. I'll be donating literally all of it. I asked for a refund but they didn't care.
Michael
Lunch on the go! What happened to the plastic tubs?
Peyton
It was super easy to make every morning and SOO yummy. It tastes just like chocolate milk even when you make it with water. I just wish it wasn't so sweet or there was an unsweetened option. Also sucralose is not so bueno so I won't be buying it again.
Philip
I only got this because they were out of my Original which I add Chocolate Malt Ovaltine to. The Cacao was too chocolatey, too sweet, and left a weird aftertaste most of the time.
Clark
The chocolate powder is great! I like to mix a few scoops of chocolate powder with the regular powder!
Todd
I like this it is kind of chocolaty so I usually mix it half and half with the Soylent original.
Doug
Powder is a great meal replacement or supplement and Squares are fantastic snacks.
Genevieve
One of the pouches I recurved had a hole in it And spread the powder all over the inside of the box. This is the second package I've had recently like this.
Kpanicker
Would love more sustainable packaging options.
Kelly
I love the powder form, because I actually like the consistency better with only one scoop. Also, the cocoa is sooooo much better than the new creamy chocolate.
Clark
Soylent has been a huge game changer for me. You can use it to lose weight, gain weight, or just maintain a healthy diet while living a busy lifestyle. I personally lost 60lbs (I was heavily overweight, now at my goal weight!) utilizing Soylent. I was able to hit my macros and micros every single day using Soylent, which also tastes amazing. It kept me full and satisfied, it's economical, it's environmentally friendly and it's healthy. Soylent is the future!
Red the Curious
Thanks for helping me save precious time. Now I can just mix, drink, and get back to my work of passion. Cacao flavor tastes nice, like chocolate milk.
Miriah
I would like this product more if it had no sugar and more cacao powder. Decent flavor and texture.
Nick
I work out to gain weight and improve my fitness. I consistently gagged and could not down protein shakes. I also miss breakfast often. This not only helps with missing meals, but also doubles as both a ""protein shake"" and also just something I drink on the regular, even with meals. It helps a lot and tastes great!
Kendra
I love this stuff. I'm a writer and can get so involved I don't eat or don't feel like prepping food. This is a perfect solution for me: it's super fast to prepare and tastes really good. I use milk to mix it and look forward to drinking it. I usually do one meal with Soylent. I like knowing how many calories I'm ingesting as it helps me stick to my CICO plan without much effort. I've lost some weight on it.
Michael
This is a staple of my diet. Everyday for lunch I mix it with Original, frozen berries, and almond milk for a great smoothie.
Laura
cacao powder v1.9 is great. Different formula and flavor profile from the RTD so the powder doesn't make me sick like the RTD does. Please don't change it!
Merideth
I use it often in smoothies - usually every other day (I switch it out with another plant protein). It blends easily and the chocolate flavor is pleasant and doesn't have that fake sweetener taste that many powders have.
Gregory
Great way to replace a meal with little fuss. Mix up a pitcher from a packet and you're good for a few days.
Ryan
We love Soylent! The chocolate is great, it tastes good enough that even our little children ask for some constantly. Plus it's healthy!
Ryan
A few years back I had an earlier Soylent Cacao flavor, and it left a lot to be desired. This new blend is much better - it tastes like the hot chocolate packets I used to love as a kid.
David
My first 1k calories of the day is from Soylent, really convenient for the work week. Been doing it for years and I haven't got tired of the flavor, still good to me. The powder is pretty cost efficient too.
Douglas
I bought this on a recommendation because I thought it would be perfect for my lifestyle. I didn't look closely at the contents until it arrived and I was shocked at the amount of sugar it contains. I haven't used very much of it.
Kurt
Love Soylent cacao powder. There are many days where it's most of what I eat. Great stuff!
Charlie
Is great if you don't have time to eat complicated meals. Tastes horrible in my opinion. Purely functional.
Logan
I use the product to substitute my lunches because it doesn't take time out of my day. Highly recommend for productive people.
Mary
Love this product i am now getting my vitamins and feeling great about it!
Johnson
Tastes great and keeps me full
Claire
Tasty on its own or with peanut butter powder
Sofia
Perfect meal when you are busy. Its easy to track calories and it tastes good. Id repurchase in an instant.
Will
Too much sugar/sweetener. I crash too quickly after drinking this product to make it a viable meal replacement. It tastes wonderful, but within an hour of using it, I'm starving again. If you are after a tasty treat, Soylent is fine - I recommend adding bananas, strawberries, or raspberries.
Laurie
Breakfast and dinner on the go. Great way to stay healthy when I have no time.
Andres
Excellent product. Will use frequently. Tip: use milk and not water if taste is not to your liking.
Greg
Much better flavor than original. Hopefully, you won't run another holiday season special this year and run out of product for your ongoing subscribers.
Glenn
At work, I'm on-call even during lunch. Soylent is perfect for me, being quick, easy, and filling no matter if lunch is five minutes or thirty minutes. The Cacao flavor is a good balance for me, the chocolate lover, and even my wife likes this one. I've been a big fan of Soylent from the first time that I found out about it, and this is a good continuation of an excellent product line.
Carl
I much prefer the cacao flavor to the newer chocolate flavor.
Douglas
I have been using Soylent as my primary dietary intake for years. For the entirety of that time, I needed to add stevia in order to alleviate my aversion to the flavor of the unaltered original Soylent. With Cacao, that is no longer necessary. This saves me the trouble of having to add sweetener, and I love it.
Bruce
I like it. It's breakfast for me,holds me to lunch. I mix it 50/50 with Original. it is too much chocolate for me otherwise.
Christina
Mix in a 16oz cup add ice and drink.
William
Cheap, convenient, and fairly tasty. It makes for one meal a day where I don't have to think but still know is nutritionally balanced. Plus I'm having quite a few dental procedures; so, liquid meals are perfect for those days. Leaning towards all powder vs bottled now that the bottled formula is so sweet.
William
Considering the subscription
Jen
I used Soylent as the foundation for a ten day liquid diet post skull surgery and it really allowed me to maintain a healthy diet relatively easily. I know drink it for a meal on a weekly basis and would definitely recommend this flavor.
Dakota
I've tried a few powdered meals and so far this has the best taste and texture. Reminds me almost of a cake batter without being too sweet.
STEVEN
Every morning I look forward to my soylent breakfast smoothie (soylent, frozen banana and almond milk)! Delicious and nutritional!
Ian
Cacao Soylent powder is pretty good. I mix 1 scoop of Soylent with ~1 cup water and ~2 cups milk, and I find that ratio yummy. I actually crave some chocolate Soylent from time to time in addition to my daily shake. The mix satisfies me for roughly 3.5 hours. Acts as a mild laxative, but hey, I'm in it for the morning routine so works for me!
Susan
It's delicious, a complete meal, and so quick and easy to prepare. Perfect for breakfast on the go, a quick lunch or dinner after a long day when you get home late and the last thing you want to do is cook a meal. Plus, it gives me extra time to snuggle with my pup! Who doesn't like that?!
Seth
I use it for quick meals at work. Love the price, ease, and taste. The only downside is that the fake sugar sometimes hurts my stomach.
Collin
I thought losing my sense of smell from COVID sucked at first, but now, after 4 months, I save so much time and money not eating ever, I just drink this all day everyday and get a lot more done.
Andres
First things first. Cacao is great. It tastes quite nice and rich if you mix it with milk (I personally cannot use it with water). Now, I am currently going through lethargic depression. Because of this, I have struggled to meet daily intake of nutrients. But this product gave me easy and affordable access to quality nutrition, which improved by energy almost immediately. I could then use that energy to improve myself and get out of my rut. I am still climbing, but I credit Soylent with making it easier to get started. For anyone who struggles with something similar, I cannot recommend this product enough.
Troy
I would put five star but the zip locks wont close for me.
Mark
Mix with a bottle of water after my workout instead of a protein shake or smoothie. Better for me and same great taste
FRANK
I mix it up it the blender, and put it in the pitcher they gave me when I placed my first order years ago. That gives me four great tasting meals. I really like the taste a lot better than the plain Soylent powder. I wish they would make other flavors in powder form besides Cacao. Banana, Strawberry, and Vanilla would be good choices.
Keaton
I only drink one a day, which is soon after I get up. At first I was off put by the chalky taste, but after I took the advice of putting crushed ice and giving another shake I was very happy! Very reminiscent of the premade drink I had from Soylent 3 years ago. This will last me another few weeks since I'm drinking at 1/3 of the speed, but I'll definitely be back for more!
Jeff
I have used this as breakfast for the last 8 months. It's been great. I've actually used it and huel. The flavor is great. The texture is smooth. My biggest issue is the sugar content. Slow burning is great but I would prefer less. Less saturated fat if possible too.
Kp
Tastes great, I like the texture and it keeps me full until lunchtime. The powder is great value for the amount of shakes it makes.
Big Ben
The first scoop from a fresh bag may taste like a cheap chocolate cookie from a paper bag, but after trying this for a week I am happy with the flavor. I also enjoy having the extra calories through the day. My preferred serving is one 12oz serving of Soylent mixed with one 8oz serving of my favorite vanilla flavored whey protein drink. Anyhow, I'm getting what I had hoped for from Soylent, quick, simple and tasty calories I can drink. Soylent, I think I love you. Don't ever change.
Daphne
Great product. I only wish that you offered more flavors of the powder. I'd rather not buy the little bottles since no recycling center on Hawai'i accepts plastics anymore except for redeemable bottles such as soda or other soft drink ones.
Shane
Actually works for breakfast. Most liquid type meal replacement things don't make me feel very full but soylent gets it done. I don't love the taste. The premade soylent tastes MUCH better, but the value of the powder is too good for me to pass up as a broke college student.
Michelle
Soylent is great for the grab and go meal so that you aren't eating fast food. My husband and I often use it as a 'diet restart' when we start eating too much junk food, and then continue to use it as a supplement for meals that we are simply too busy (or too tired) to make something. Its great for me to keep at my work (laboratory) because I have days where I dont have time to sit down and eat. Does it taste amazing? No, but its not terrible. We mix ours with a flavored protein powder and that gives it something a bit extra.
Z
It is great cant wait to try the rest of the flavors.
Dee
I Love this product and have been a regular customer since the beginning. If you end free shipping on powered food then I hope you can maintain the same general price after. The low cost of your powder has allowed me to see what it feels like to be fully nourished. I was a latch-key kid growing up so I never received decent nutrition until your company arrived a few years ago. Please keep the cost low for your powder by maybe only increasing the price of the convenient liquid product. I'm writing here as a sincere Thank You to the founder and employees that are so dedicated to bringing healthy nutrition to everyone!
L
7 bags of cacao powder as ordered very useful when you don't want to cook or go shopping.
Joe the researcher
I use it daily for 3-4 meals.
Angie
When left to my own devices, I eat cereal 3X a day. It's not that I can't cook- I can and I'm even quite good at it. But cooking, and doing all those dishes every day is annoying so I don't do it. I noticed I was eating breakfast cereal for every meal and I needed a better option. I've been having Soylent 3X a day for over a year and my weight is better, I feel great and I only have to wash a blender and cups!

upsells.title: Try LadyBoss Lean
upsells.subtitle: Have Your Cake & Eat It Too!

product.title: LadyBoss Lean
product.description:
Fulfilled by our friends at ladyboss.swagagain.com

FREE Bonuses Included With Purchase:
Form: Powder Flavor: Vanilla Cake # of Servings: 30 full scoops Serving Size: 1 scoop/ 28g
SUGGESTED USE:
  • Add 1 scoop of LadyBoss LEAN ® to 6-8 oz of water, almond milk, or your favorite liquid and mix thoroughly in a shaker bottle or blender (adjust amount of liquid to achieve desired consistency)
  • For optimal texture & results, consume immediately after mixing with desired liquid
  • For maximum results drink LadyBoss LEAN® 3x per day.
  • BONUS: LadyBoss LEAN® is extra delicious mixed with 1 scoop of LadyBoss GREENS® to get all the benefits of LEAN® PLUS the antioxidant equivalent of 8 FULL SERVINGS of fruits & veggies in a tasty Apple Pie A-La-Mode flavor.
